read-write: @property (readwrite) type bar;  and then inside @implementation  @synthesize bar;
read-only: @property (readonly) type bar;  and then inside @implementation  @synthesize bar;

read-write: member val Bar = value with get, set

read-only: level-number bar clauses PROPERTY «WITH» NO SET.
write-only: level-number bar clauses PROPERTY «WITH» NO GET.
